content: © 2015 alessandra hayden you may sell what you make but please credit me just be happy patterns for the pattern you may not use my photos you may not sell the pattern distribute it in any form post it online or alter it to claim it as your own please share your completed projects on my facebook page www facebook com/justbehappypatterns or tag #justbehappycrochet on instagram feel free to contact me with any questions or for pattern support thank you for shopping just be happy
